content: The file shared by link will expire in <1>{{date}}</1>

comment.text: This key displays the expiration date for a file shared via a link. It appears as a small text label, likely on a quick button or similar element, informing the user when the link will no longer be valid. Translators should ensure the date format is appropriate for the target locale.

usage.context:
<Text fontSize="12px" fontWeight={400} noSelect>
 <Trans
 t={t}
 ns="Common"
 values={{ date }}
 i18nKey="LinkExpirationDate"
 components={{ 1: <strong /> }}
 />
 </Text>
 );
 };
